short_description: This tool calculates Fairfield and Leymarie (1991) flow accumulation.

parameters.name: Input DEM or Rho8 Pointer File
parameters.description: Input DEM or Rho8 pointer file; if a DEM is used, it must be depressionless.

parameters.name: Output Raster File
parameters.description: Name of the output raster file.

parameters.name: Output Type
parameters.description: Output type; one of 'cells', 'specific contributing area' (default), and 'catchment area'.

parameters.name: Clip the upper tail by 1%?
parameters.description: Optional flag to request clipping the display max by 1%.

parameters.name: Is the input raster a Rho8 flow pointer?
parameters.description: Is the input raster a Rho8 flow pointer rather than a DEM?

parameters.name: If a pointer is input, does it use the ESRI pointer scheme?
parameters.description: Does the input Rho8 pointer use the ESRI style scheme?
